sQuestion: If there are 7 bottle caps in a box and Linda puts 7 more bottle caps inside, how many bottle caps are in the box?
Jose starts with 7 bottle caps. He gets 2 more from Rebecca. How many bottle caps does Jose end with?
Bridget has 4 Skittles. Henry has 4 Skittles. If Henry gives all of his Skittles to Bridget, how many Skittles will Bridget have?
Brenda starts with 7 Skittles. She buys 8 more. How many Skittles does Brenda end with?
There are 4 cards. 3 cards more are added. How many are there total?
There are 4 marbles. 7 marbles more are added. How many are there total?
There are 8 oranges. 8 oranges more are added. How many are there total?
Carol collects 2 peanuts. Carol's father gives Carol 5 more. How many peanuts does Carol have?
There are 9 cards. 4 cards more are added. How many are there total?
Bobby collects 2 blocks. Bobby's father gives Bobby 6 more. How many blocks does Bobby have?
Peter starts with 8 erasers. Bridget gives Peter 3 more. How many erasers does Peter end with?
If there are 7 crayons in a box and Gerald puts 6 more crayons inside, how many crayons are in the box?
Michelle has 2 crayons. Janet has 2 crayons. If Janet gives all of her crayons to Michelle, how many crayons will Michelle have?
Anna collects 6 blocks. Anna's father gives Anna 8 more. How many blocks does Anna have?
Donald has 4 oranges. He finds another 5. How many oranges does Donald have in all?
If there are 7 eggs in a box and Daniel puts 4 more eggs inside, how many eggs are in the box?
Wayne collects 9 blocks. Wayne's father gives Wayne 6 more. How many blocks does Wayne have?
Ralph collects 4 cards. Ralph's father gives Ralph 8 more. How many cards does Ralph have?
Martha starts with 3 cards. She gets 76 more from Emily. How many cards does Martha end with?
There are 86 blocks. 9 blocks more are added. How many are there total?
Cheryl starts with 8 Skittles. Kathryn gives Cheryl 89 more. How many Skittles does Cheryl end with?
If there are 76 erasers in a box and Patrick puts 9 more erasers inside, how many erasers are in the box?
Amy starts with 7 peanuts. Gerald gives Amy 55 more. How many peanuts does Amy end with?
Teresa starts with 52 bananas. She gets 2 more from Rachel. How many bananas does Teresa end with?
Gloria has 2 pencils. Lisa has 99 pencils. If Lisa gives all of her pencils to Gloria, how many pencils will Gloria have?
Mildred collects 77 oranges. Mildred's father gives Mildred 2 more. How many oranges does Mildred have?
Anna starts with 5 candies. She gets 86 more from Larry. How many candies does Anna end with?
Martha has 2 peanuts. Joyce has 26 peanuts. If Joyce gives all of her peanuts to Martha, how many peanuts will Martha have?
Kevin starts with 7 cards. He finds another 47. How many cards does Kevin end with?
Joshua has 40 bottle caps. He buys 7 more. How many bottle caps does Joshua have in all?
Nicholas starts with 8 bottle caps. He gets 85 more from Catherine. How many bottle caps does Nicholas end with?
Mary starts with 27 eggs. She finds another 4. How many eggs does Mary end with?
Shirley starts with 98 eggs. She buys 8 more. How many eggs does Shirley end with?
William starts with 15 tickets. He buys 3 more. How many tickets does William end with?
Harry starts with 79 apples. He buys 5 more. How many apples does Harry end with?
Barbara has 9 candies. She buys 18 more. How many candies does Barbara have in all?
Eugene has 51 pencils. He gets 6 more from Joyce. How many pencils does Eugene have in all?
Anthony has 9 pencils. Kathryn gives Anthony 56 more. How many pencils does Anthony have in all?
Andrew starts with 8 eggs. He buys 62 more. How many eggs does Andrew end with?
Annie starts with 4 crayons. Matthew gives Annie 36 more. How many crayons does Annie end with?
Angela has 11 tickets. Annie gives Angela 4 more. How many tickets does Angela have in all?
Charles has 4 apples. Jessica gives Charles 39 more. How many apples does Charles have in all?
Lisa starts with 91 bananas. Maria gives Lisa 8 more. How many bananas does Lisa end with?
Evelyn starts with 18 bottle caps. She finds another 63. How many bottle caps does Evelyn end with?
Brenda has 34 apples. She gets 37 more from Willie. How many apples does Brenda have in all?
Joseph has 67 candies. Kathy gives Joseph 38 more. How many candies does Joseph have in all?
Janet has 57 apples. She finds another 95. How many apples does Janet have in all?
Nancy starts with 91 bottle caps. She finds another 88. How many bottle caps does Nancy end with?
Harold has 53 marbles. He gets 16 more from Steve. How many marbles does Harold have in all?
Tina has 82 bananas. She gets 3 more from Joyce. How many bananas does Tina have in all?
Janet has 3 stickers. She gets 53 more from Ruth. How many stickers does Janet have in all?
Jennifer starts with 7 apples. She finds another 74. How many apples does Jennifer end with?
Helen starts with 9 oranges. She gets 29 more from Ann. How many oranges does Helen end with?
William has 2 bottle caps. He buys 41 more. How many bottle caps does William have in all?
Wanda has 4 blocks. Theresa gives Wanda 79 more. How many blocks does Wanda have in all?
Sarah has 26 bottle caps. She buys 3 more. How many bottle caps does Sarah have in all?
Lillian collects 88 candies. Lillian's father gives Lillian 5 more. How many candies does Lillian have?
There are 8 apples in a pile on the desk. Each apple comes in a package of 11. 5 apples are added to the pile. How many apples are there in the pile?
Sean has 9 apples. Susan gives Sean 8 more. Later, Sean buys 18 tickets at the store. How many apples does Sean have in all?
There are 2 bananas in a pile on the desk. Each banana comes in a package of 17. 7 bananas are added to the pile. How many bananas are there in the pile?
There are 6 candies in a pile on the desk. Each candy comes in a package of 15. 4 candies are added to the pile. How many candies are there in the pile?
Kimberly has 5 Skittles. She buys 7 more. Later, Kimberly buys 18 oranges at the store. How many Skittles does Kimberly have in all?
Clarence has 5 oranges. He gets 3 more from Joyce. Later, Clarence buys 9 Skittles at the store. How many oranges does Clarence have in all?
There are 2 apples in a pile on the desk. Each apple comes in a package of 7. 4 apples are added to the pile. How many apples are there in the pile?
Annie has 6 apples. She gets 6 more from Nathan. Later, Annie buys 10 crayons at the store. How many apples does Annie have in all?
Joyce has 8 eggs. Marie gives Joyce 6 more. Later, Joyce buys 13 erasers at the store. How many eggs does Joyce have in all?
There are 2 bananas in a pile on the desk. Each banana comes in a package of 13. 7 bananas are added to the pile. How many bananas are there in the pile?
Kenneth has 3 marbles. He buys 6 more. Later, Kenneth buys 15 apples at the store. How many marbles does Kenneth have in all?
Arthur has 6 cards. Aaron has with 5 cards. Aaron finds another 62. How many cards does Aaron end with?
Scott has 4 tickets. Ernest has with 9 tickets. Ernest finds another 72. How many tickets does Ernest end with?
Diane has 37 crayons. She gets 5 more from Frances. Later, Diane buys 16 cards at the store. How many crayons does Diane have in all?
Adam has 13 blocks. Ann has with 9 blocks. Ann finds another 44. How many blocks does Ann end with?
Ronald has 13 blocks. Martha has with 4 blocks. Martha finds another 80. How many blocks does Martha end with?
Albert has 9 bottle caps. Anne has with 10 bottle caps. Anne finds another 5. How many bottle caps does Anne end with?
Evelyn has 95 marbles. She gets 9 more from Henry. Later, Evelyn buys 6 cards at the store. How many marbles does Evelyn have in all?
David has 8 bananas. He gets 50 more from Christopher. Later, David buys 9 cards at the store. How many bananas does David have in all?
Emily collects 63 cards. Emily's father gives Emily 7 more. Bruce has 13 apples. How many cards does Emily have?
Shawn has 13 blocks. Mildred has with 2 blocks. Mildred finds another 84. How many blocks does Mildred end with?
2 birds were sitting on the fence. 4 more birds came to join them. How many birds are sitting on the fence?
3 owls were sitting on the fence. 2 more owls joined them. How many owls are on the fence now?
2 toucans are sitting on a tree limb. 1 more toucan joins them. How many toucans in all?
Mrs. Hilt bought a yoyo for 24 cents and a whistle for 14 cents. How much did she spend in all for the two toys?
Mary’s mom is getting ready for Mary’s birthday party. She blew up 6 balloons this morning and 5 balloons this afternoon. How many balloons  did she blow up in all?
Shelby’s teacher gives out gold stars for great math work. Yesterday, Shelby earned 4 gold stars. Today, she earned 3 more. How many gold  stars did Shelby earn in all?
The Litter Patrol picked up 10 glass bottles and 8 aluminum cans on Saturday. How many pieces of litter did they pick up altogether?
Carson’s teacher gives out gold stars for great math work. Yesterday, Carson earned 6 gold stars. Today, he earned 9 more. How many gold  stars did Carson earn in all?
Lucy went to the grocery store. She bought 12 packs of cookies and 16  packs of noodles. How many packs of groceries did she buy in all?
Roden went to a pet shop. He bought 15 gold fish and 7 blue fish. How many fish did he buy?
I read 21 pages of my English book yesterday. Today, I read 17 pages. What is the total number of pages did I read?
In a school, there are 542 girls and 387 boys. How many pupils are there in that school?
Linda has 34 candies. Chloe has 28. How many candies do they have in all?
Gino has 63 popsicle sticks. I have 50 popsicle sticks. What is the sum of our popsicle sticks?
Lino picked up 292 shells at the seashore in the morning and 324 shells in the afternoon. How many shells did he pick up in all?
There were 105 parents in the program and 698 pupils, too. How many people were present in the program?
Last Saturday, Marie sold 425 magazines and 275 newspapers. What is the total number of reading materials she sold?
There are 12 birds on the fence. 8 more birds land on the fence. How many birds are on the fence?
22 boys went down the slide. 13 more boys went down the slide. How many boys went down the slide?
13 ducks are swimming in a lake. 20 more ducks come to join them. How many ducks are swimming in the lake?
30 dogs are barking. 10 more dogs start to bark. How many dogs are barking?
Bobby ate 26 pieces of candy. Then, he ate 17 more. How many pieces of candy did Bobby eat?
Sandy had 26 pet fish. She bought 6 more fish. How many pet fish does Sandy have now?
The clown blew up 47 balloons. Then he blew up 13 more balloons. How many balloons does the clown have now?
Our class got 54 books from the library. Then we got 23 more books from the library. How many books did our class get from the library?
Tessa has 4 apples. Anita gave her 5 more. She needs 10 apples to make a pie. Does she have enough to make a pie?
Molly had 14 candles on her birthday cake. She grew older and got 6 more on her birthday cake. How old is Molly now?
James ate 22 carrot sticks before dinner and 15 more after dinner. How many carrot sticks did he eat?
Jovana filled her bucket with 5 pounds of shells. If she adds 12 more pounds of shell to fill her bucket, how many pounds does she have?
Isha’s pencil is 12 cubes long. If she gets another pencil that is 12 cubes long, how many cubes long are both pencils?
Isabella’s hair is 18 cubes long. If her hair grows 4 more inches, how long will it be?
Mrs. Sheridan has 17 cats. Mr. Sheridan gave her 14 more cats. How many cats does Mrs. Sheridan have altogether?
Mrs. Sheridan has 22 fish. Her sister gave her 47 more fish. How many fish does she have now?
Daniel had some noodles. He gave 12 noodles to William. Now Daniel only has 54 noodles. How many noodles did Daniel have to begin with?
14 birds were sitting in a tree. 21 more birds flew up to the tree. How many birds were there altogether in the tree?
Cindy’s mom baked 41 cookies. Paul’s dad baked 38 cookies. They both brought them to school for a party. How many cookies did they  have altogether?
There were 28 girls and 35 boys on the playground at recess. How many children were there in all?
There were 44 boys and 53 girls on the playground at recess. How many children were on the playground in all?
There were 58 geese and 37 ducks in the marsh. How many birds were there in all?
Paul had 42 strawberries in his basket. He picked 78 more strawberries. How many strawberries did he have then?
There were 14 kids on the soccer field. 22 kids decided to join in. Now how many kids are on the soccer field?
Jane has 28 old, brown sheets of drawing paper and 27 old, yellow sheets of drawing paper. How many pieces of drawing paper does she  have?
Ethan has 31 presents. Alissa has 22 more than Ethan. How many presents does Alissa have?
On the first day of the week Pat had 39 stickers. Pat earned 22 more during the week. How many stickers did Pat have at the end of the  week?
Sarah had some trucks. She gave 13 to Jeff, and now she has 38 trucks left. How many trucks did Sarah have to start with?
Megan had 49 markers. Robert gave her 39 more markers. How many markers does Megan have altogether?
Connie had some marbles. She gave 73 to Juan. Now she has 70 marbles left. How many did she have to start with?
Connie has 41 red markers and 64 blue markers. How many markers does she have altogether?
Connie has 39 marbles. Juan has 25 more marbles than Connie. How many marbles does Juan have?
Joe had 50 toy cars. If he gets 12 more cars, how many cars will he have then?
There are 38 books on the shelf. Marta put 10 more books on the shelf. How many books are on the shelf now?
Mark has 13 trees in his backyard. If he plants 12 more, how many trees will he have?
Charlie has 31 more snowballs than Lucy. She has 19 snowballs. How many does Charlie have?
179 birds were sitting in a tree. 38 more birds flew up to the tree. How many birds were there altogether in the tree?
Cindy’s mom baked 1215 cookies. Paul’s dad baked 1112 cookies. They both brought them to school for a party. How many cookies did  they have altogether?
There were 27 boys and 35 girls on the playground at recess. How many children were on the playground at recess?
There were 58 geese and 37 ducks in the marsh. How many birds were in the marsh?
Paul had 28 strawberries in his basket. He picked 35 more strawberries. How many strawberries did he have then?
Jose has 85 peanuts. Kenya has 48 more than Jose. How many peanuts does Kenya have?
Megan had 217 markers. Robert gave her 109 more markers. How many markers does Megan have altogether?
Connie had some marbles. She gave 183 to Juan. Now she has 593 marbles left. How many did she have to start with?
Connie has 2315 red markers and 1028 blue markers. How many markers does she have altogether?
The town of Milburg has 5256 grown-ups and 2987 children. How many people live in Milburg?

Mrs. Hilt went to a concert. A total of 65899 people attended the concert. The next week, she went to a second concert, which had 119  more people in attendance. How many people were at the second  concert?
Mrs. Hilt baked pies last weekend for a holiday dinner. She baked 16 pecan pies and 14 apples pies. If she wants to arrange all of the pies in  rows of 5 pies each, how many rows will she have?
Lucy has an aquarium with 212 fish. She wants to buy 68 more fish. How many fish would Lucy have then?

Rupert and Ronald aced their math test. So their mother bought for them a wonderful trampoline yesterday. Ronald jumped 157 times on  the trampoline. Rupert jumped 86 more times than Ronald. How many  times did they jump altogether?

Harry Hound had a terrible earache yesterday. When I peered into his ears yesterday, I found 36 frisky fleas having a party in his right ear and  85 baby fleas sleeping peacefully in his left ear. I cleaned out Harry  Hound's ears. How many fleas perished?
Jazmin had 1209 dolls and Geraldine had 2186 dolls. If they put their dolls together, how many would they have?
Mariela was in the hospital and she got 403 get well cards from around the country. When she got home she got 287 more cards from friends  and family. How many get well cards did Mariela get?
Jorge scored 156 goals playing soccer last season. This season he scored 187 goals. What is the total number of goals Jorge scored?
Omar and Karen made egg rolls to share at the school potluck. Omar rolled 219 egg rolls. Karen rolled 229 egg rolls. What is the total number  of egg rolls Omar and Karen rolled?
Darius drove 679 miles to visit his grandmother. Julia drove 998 miles to visit her grandmother. What is the total number of miles Darius and Julia  drove?
Your class had a pizza party. 0.375 of a pizza was left over, and 0.5 of another pizza was left over. You put them both into one box. How much  pizza do you have altogether?
A cake recipe requires 0.6 cup of sugar for the frosting and 0.2 cup of sugar for the cake. How much sugar is that altogether?
You go out for a long walk. You walk 0.75 mile and then sit down to take a rest. Then you walk 0.25 of a mile. How far did you walk altogether?
